Resources

A list of resources that are being used, or referenced, frequently in the code&share workshops. Links open in new windows

Processing A flexible software sketchbook and a language for learning how to code within the context of the visual arts https://processing.org/
P5.js A javascript client-side library for creating graphic and interactive experiences, based on the core principles of Processing https://p5js.org/
Coding Train A YouTube channel dedicated to beginner-friendly creative coding tutorials and challenges Coding Train, Youtube
Processing Foundation Empowering people of all interests and backgrounds to learn how to program https://processingfoundation.org/
OpenFrameworks openFrameworks is an open source C++ toolkit for creative coding https://openframeworks.cc/
